Class ParentedTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.hk2.tests.locator.parented.ParentedTest

  • public class ParentedTest
extends Object
    Author:
    jwells

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParentedTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testBasicParenting()
      Tests three generations of locators
      void testContextInParent()
      First looks up a service in a parent-defined context from the child, the closes the child and looks it up again from the parent.
      void testDynamicallyAddServiceToGrandParentAfterALookup()
      Tests that if we dynamically add a descriptor to the GRAND-parent AFTER it has been looked up in the child that we can find it in the child
      void testDynamicallyAddServiceToParentAfterALookup()
      Tests that if we dynamically add a descriptor to the parent AFTER it has been looked up in the child that we can find it in the child
      void testDynamicConfigurationIsLocal()
      Tests that DynamicConfigurationService is a LOCAL service
      void testServiceLocatorIsLocal()
      Tests that ServiceLocator is a LOCAL service
      void testShutdownOfChild()
      Tests that a child getting shutdown will not adversly affect the services in the parent

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ParentedTest

    • Method Detail

      • testBasicParenting

        public void testBasicParenting()
        Tests three generations of locators

      • testShutdownOfChild

        public void testShutdownOfChild()
        Tests that a child getting shutdown will not adversly affect the services in the parent

      • testContextInParent

        public void testContextInParent()
        First looks up a service in a parent-defined context from the child, the closes the child and looks it up again from the parent. This test was inspired by http://fuegotracker.ar.oracle.com/browse/FPP-480

      • testDynamicallyAddServiceToParentAfterALookup

        public void testDynamicallyAddServiceToParentAfterALookup()
        Tests that if we dynamically add a descriptor to the parent AFTER it has been looked up in the child that we can find it in the child

      • testDynamicallyAddServiceToGrandParentAfterALookup

        public void testDynamicallyAddServiceToGrandParentAfterALookup()
        Tests that if we dynamically add a descriptor to the GRAND-parent AFTER it has been looked up in the child that we can find it in the child

      • testServiceLocatorIsLocal

        public void testServiceLocatorIsLocal()
        Tests that ServiceLocator is a LOCAL service

      • testDynamicConfigurationIsLocal

        public void testDynamicConfigurationIsLocal()
        Tests that DynamicConfigurationService is a LOCAL service
